project_descr: Support the government implement a poverty-sensitive development policy agenda by building its capacity for evidence based planning, budgeting, program execution, and resource mobilization.

outputs.output_descr: Improved program execution and financial reporting.  The purpose of this project is to enable the states and counties to "learn by doing", to enhance the financial management capacity of government and reduce leakages in line with the President's pledge or promoting accountability and transparency,  to strengthen internal financial controls in support of the work of the accounting officers, to diversify the income of government in order to reduce dependency on oil-based revenues and to strengthen the capacity of government to implement public programmes.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Improved coordination and management of external support. The purpose of this project is to reduce the likelihood of duplication of activities and increase synergy between intervention of the various development actors and to assure the achievement of   project objectives with quality,on time and within budget.
Improved capacity for production, use and dissemination of reliable socio-economic statistics for evidence based planning and poverty monitoring.

Improved pro-poor planning, budgeting, and impact monitoring . The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of government at the three levels (national, state and county) to draft pro-poor, gender and conflict sensitive medium term and annual work plans and budgets, to strengthen the research capacity of within Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning (MoFEP) and the state ministries of finance to support the development of pro- poor policies and programmes, to to develop capacities within the MoFEP and state ministries of Finance for evaluating the impact of public expenditure and
